metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5427 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A local non-privileged user can make improper GPU processing operations togain access to already freed memory.

criterions.comment: gcc-3.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
